bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of massive spontaneous bleeding from mouth and nose. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 193: 凡口鼻 出血不止，名腦衄 , “All incessant bleeding from the mouth and nose is called ‘ brainbleed’ ”. The Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 has this term only once in the paragraph Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 . Elsewhere in the main text it always speaks of kou bi da nü 口鼻大衄 , “massive bleeding from the mouth and nose”.
